healthy.title: Your tree seems healthy
healthy.description: Based on the information provided, your tree does not show signs of major problems.
recommendations: Continue to water the tree regularly
Maintain mulch at the base of the tree
Monitor any changes in its appearance

warning.title: Your tree needs attention
warning.description: Some signs indicate that your tree could be stressed or at the beginning of a disease.
recommendations: Increase watering if the soil is dry
Consider light pruning of affected branches
Consult an arborist if symptoms persist

danger.title: Your tree shows signs of disease
danger.description: Your tree has symptoms that require prompt intervention.
recommendations: Isolate the tree if possible to prevent spread
Avoid pruning or further stressing the tree
Take detailed photos of the symptoms for the expert

unknown.title: Incomplete diagnosis
unknown.description: We don't have enough information to establish a complete diagnosis.
recommendations: Observe the tree over several days
Consult a professional for an on-site diagnosis
